languages.text: Стоило кораблю завершить выход из варпа, как тысячи матросов, собираясь в команды, бросились на ремонт основных повреждений. Воля бесстрашно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана вела их, и в тот момент я остро завидовал их решимости.

traits.locale_text: Стоило кораблю завершить выход из варпа, как тысячи матросов, собираясь в команды, бросились на ремонт основных повреждений. Воля бесстрашно{mf|го|й} Лорда-Капитана вела их, и в тот момент я остро завидовал их решимости.

languages.text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.
languages.original_text: Стоило кораблю завершить выход из варпа, как тысячи матросов, собираясь в команды, бросились на ремонт основных повреждений. Воля бесстрашно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана вела их, и в тот момент я остро завидовал их решимости.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

languages.text: En cuanto la nave salió de la disformidad, miles de tripulantes organizados en equipos empezaron a reparar las zonas más dañadas. Les guiaba la voluntad de nuestr{mf|o|a} intrépid{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, y, en ese momento, debo admitir que envidié su determinación.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto la nave salió de la disformidad, miles de tripulantes organizados en equipos empezaron a reparar las zonas más dañadas. Les guiaba la voluntad de nuestr{mf|o|a} intrépid{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, y, en ese momento, debo admitir que envidié su determinación.

languages.text: 飞船刚一离开亚空间，就有几千名船员集结成小组，开始修复最严重的受损区域。我们无畏的舰长大人钢铁般的意志驱使着他们，在那一刻，我深深地向往着他们的决心。
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

traits.locale_text: 飞船刚一离开亚空间，就有几千名船员集结成小组，开始修复最严重的受损区域。我们无畏的舰长大人钢铁般的意志驱使着他们，在那一刻，我深深地向往着他们的决心。

languages.text: 船が歪みを抜けるとすぐに、数千人のクルーがチームに分かれて、損傷の大きいエリアの修復に取り掛かっていた。恐れを知らぬ我らのロード・キャプテンの意志が彼らを駆り立てていた。その瞬間、私はその決意を深くうらやましく思った。
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

traits.locale_text: 船が歪みを抜けるとすぐに、数千人のクルーがチームに分かれて、損傷の大きいエリアの修復に取り掛かっていた。恐れを知らぬ我らのロード・キャプテンの意志が彼らを駆り立てていた。その瞬間、私はその決意を深くうらやましく思った。

languages.text: Sobald das Schiff den Warp verlassen hatte, machten sich Tausende von Besatzungsmitgliedern in Teams daran, die größten Schäden zu beheben. Der Wille unseres furchtlosen Lord Captains trieb sie an, und in diesem Moment beneidete ich sie zutiefst um ihre Entschlossenheit.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

languages.text: À peine le vaisseau sorti du Warp, des milliers de membres d'équipage se sont lancés comme un seul homme dans la réparation des dégâts majeurs. La volonté de notre intrépide {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} les animait et, à ce moment précis, j'ai profondément envié leur détermination.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

traits.locale_text: À peine le vaisseau sorti du Warp, des milliers de membres d'équipage se sont lancés comme un seul homme dans la réparation des dégâts majeurs. La volonté de notre intrépide {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} les animait et, à ce moment précis, j'ai profondément envié leur détermination.

languages.text: Gemi öteboyuttan çıkar çıkmaz binlerce tayfa, ekiplere ayrılarak önemli noktalardaki hasarları gidermeye başladı. Korkusuz Lord Kaptanımızın iradesi, onların motivasyon kaynağıydı. İşte o an, kararlılıklarına derinden gıpta ettim.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, thousands of crew members, assembled into teams, launched into repairing the major areas of damage. The will of our fearless Lord Captain drove them, and in that moment, I deeply envied their resolve.

traits.locale_text: Gemi öteboyuttan çıkar çıkmaz binlerce tayfa, ekiplere ayrılarak önemli noktalardaki hasarları gidermeye başladı. Korkusuz Lord Kaptan'ımızın iradesi onlara motivasyon sağlıyordu. O anda onların bu kararlılığına içten bir şekilde gıpta ettim.
